message:
SYSTEM: GeneralOntologies2013.pdf: Página 81
Based on Mariano Fernández-López, Asunción Gómez-Pérez and Mª Carmen Suárez Figuereoa’s work 
81 
STUDY CASE 
CQ identifier 
Application of heuristics 
Type of general 
ontology for reuse 
CQ1 
(Which 
drugs 
contain 
paracetamol?) and CQ2 (Which 
drugs contain paracetamol?)  
Heuristic 1. This competency question is 
asking for structural parts. 
Mereology 
CQ3 (What is the main active 
ingredient of Frenadol®?) 
Heuristic 2. Every active ingredient of a drug is 
a structural part of the drug. Therefore, 
main_active_ingredient_of is a sub-relation of 
part_of. 
Mereology 
CQ4 (With which substances does 
Frenadol® interact?) 
 
Heuristic 1. To find out whether a drug 
interacts with other substances, it is necessary 
to know the interaction of each of its structural 
parts with other substances. 
Mereology 
CQ5, CQ6, CQ7 and CQ8 
 
Heuristic 
3.There 
are 
specialized 
time 
patterns: 11 May 2012, 30 April 2010 
 
There is a preposition of time: before. 
Time modelling
speaker: SYSTEM
